statements: UPDATE order_processing_tasks SET order_status='Processing', order_timestamp=NOW(), customer_name='John Doe' WHERE order_id=123;
UPDATE order_processing_tasks SET order_description='New Order Description', customer_name='Jane Smith', order_status='Shipped' WHERE order_id=456;
UPDATE order_processing_tasks SET order_description = 'Updated Description', order_status = 'Completed' WHERE order_id = 12345;
UPDATE order_processing_tasks SET order_status = 'Cancelled', customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE order_id = 54321;
UPDATE Orders SET order_details = 'New details' WHERE order_id = uuid_generate_v4();
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = uuid_generate_v4();
UPDATE Orders SET order_details = 'Updated details', order_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE order_id = 'c8ec32a6-6164-4d20-804c-3782cd728b8f';
UPDATE Customers SET customer_name = 'Alice Smith', customer_email = 'alice.smith@example.com', customer_address = '123 Main Street' WHERE customer_id = '3fee4a10-c302-4267-9b7d-3feb74565910';
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = 1500.00 WHERE order_id = 1001
UPDATE Products SET price = 25.99 WHERE product_id = 2003
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = 5000.00 WHERE order_id = 1001;
UPDATE Products SET price = 20.50 WHERE product_id = 2001;
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = 150.75 WHERE order_id = 101
UPDATE Customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 201
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = 1000.50 WHERE order_id = 101
UPDATE Customers SET address = '123 Main St' WHERE customer_id = 201
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE products SET product_price = 25.99, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE product_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE orders SET order_total = 100.50, order_date = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE order_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
